content.question: Which of the following is a correct expression for the acceleration of the box in scenario 2 ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator F sub 0, times the cosine of theta, minus mu times, open parenthesis, M sub 0, times g, minus F sub 0, times the sine of theta, close parenthesis, and denominator M sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>cos</mi><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>θ</mi><mo>-</mo><mi>μ</mi><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>g</mi><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>sin</mi><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>θ</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></mrow><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator F sub 0, times the cosine of theta, minus mu times, open parenthesis, M sub 0, times g, plus F sub 0, times the sine of theta, close parenthesis, and denominator M sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>cos</mi><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>θ</mi><mo>-</mo><mi>μ</mi><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>g</mi><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>sin</mi><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>θ</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></mrow><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator F sub 0, times the cosine of theta, plus mu times, open parenthesis, M sub 0, times g, minus F sub 0, times the sine of theta, close parenthesis, and denominator M sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>cos</mi><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>μ</mi><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>g</mi><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>sin</mi><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>θ</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></mrow><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator F sub 0, times the cosine of theta, plus mu times, open parenthesis, M sub 0, times g, plus F sub 0, times the sine of theta, close parenthesis, and denominator M sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>cos</mi><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>μ</mi><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>g</mi><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>sin</mi><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>θ</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></mrow><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator F sub 0, times the cosine of theta, minus mu times, open parenthesis, M sub 0, times g, minus F sub 0, times the sine of theta, close parenthesis, and denominator M sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>cos</mi><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>θ</mi><mo>-</mo><mi>μ</mi><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>g</mi><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>sin</mi><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>θ</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></mrow><msub><mi>M</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
